name: com.allstacks/allstacks-mcp
title: Allstacks Analytics MCP Server
description: Comprehensive MCP server providing 208+ tools for AI-native engineering intelligence via Allstacks API. Access metrics, forecasting, risk management, work items, dashboards, AI analytics, and more. Requires HTTP Basic Auth credentials for Allstacks API.

ALLSTACKS_USERNAME.description: Username or email for Allstacks HTTP Basic Auth

ALLSTACKS_PASSWORD.description: Password or API key for Allstacks HTTP Basic Auth

ALLSTACKS_BASE_URL.description: Base URL for Allstacks API (default: https://api.allstacks.com/api/v1/)
